metadata.description: Specifies the Azure Active Directory tenant ID that should be used for authenticating requests to the key vault. Get it by using Get-AzSubscription cmdlet.
Specifies the permissions to secrets in the vault. Valid values are: all, get, list, set, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.
Specifies the permissions to keys in the vault. Valid values are: all, get, list, set, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.
Specifies the permissions to keys in the vault. Valid values are: all, get, list, set, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.

variables.asp_wa_name: [toLower(concat(variables('rn_appServicePlan'), '-', variables('rn_webApp'), '-', parameters('agency_abbreviation'), '-', parameters('dept_abbreviation'), '-', parameters('application'), '-', parameters('environment_type'), '-', parameters('instance_number')))]
variables.asp_fa_reminders_name: [toLower(concat(variables('rn_appServicePlan'), '-', variables('rn_funcApp'), '-', parameters('agency_abbreviation'), '-', parameters('dept_abbreviation'), '-', parameters('application'), '-', parameters('environment_type'), '-', parameters('instance_number')))]
